DOC.brief_summary: Phase I study evaluate excretion radioactivity , metabolic profile , pharmacokinetics , safety tolerability follow single oral administration [ 14C ] SPD557 healthy male volunteer age 18 50 year ( inclusive ) .The purpose study investigate quickly SPD557 break product excrete analyse blood , faeces urine sample collect study .
DOC.brief_title: Adsorption , Metabolism Excretion ( AME ) Single Dose Radiolabeled SPD557 Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Key Males age 18 50 year Have body mass index ( BMI ) ≥18.5 ≤30 kg/m2 Subject willing comply applicable contraceptive sperm donation requirement Key Exclusion criterion : Have participate [ 14C ] study within last 6 month . Exposure clinically significant radiation within 12 month prior dose ( example , serial Xray compute tomography scan , barium meal , current employment job require radiation exposure monitoring ) . Male subject consume 21 unit alcohol per week 3 unit per day . Subjects report typically 2 bowel movement per day , less 3 bowel movement per week whose bowel habit change significantly within 30 day
